headline: Why Howmet Aerospace (HWM) Is Up 7.2% After Earnings Beat And Raised Full-Year Guidance – And What's Next
summary: Howmet Aerospace recently reported quarterly results that exceeded market expectations and raised its full-year guidance, supported by strong demand for commercial aerospace engine components and fasteners amid favorable aerospace and defense spending trends. The company also previously announced a Technology and Markets Day for March 10, 2026, underscoring its emphasis on advanced engineered solutions and visibility into future growth areas for investors. We’ll now examine how the...
